com.kuka.device

Interface IRobotPositionProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RobotPositionProvider

    public interface IRobotPositionProvider
    Interface providing pose information of a robot.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.kuka.geometry.LocalFrame getCommandedCartesianPosition(com.kuka.geometry.Frame frameOnFlange)
      Gets the commanded cartesian position of the specified frame in the frame tree below the flange of the serial kinematics relative to WORLD base frame SpatialObject.getRootFrame().
      com.kuka.geometry.LocalFrame getCommandedCartesianPosition(com.kuka.geometry.Frame frameOnFlange, com.kuka.geometry.Frame reference)
      Gets the commanded cartesian position of the specified frame in the frame tree below the flange of the serial kinematics relative to the given reference frame.
      com.kuka.geometry.LocalFrame getCurrentCartesianPosition(com.kuka.geometry.Frame frameOnFlange)
      Gets the current cartesian position of the specified frame in the frame tree below the flange of the serial kinematics relative to WORLD base frame SpatialObject.getRootFrame().

      Gets the current cartesian position of the specified frame in the frame tree below the flange of the serial kinematics relative to the given reference frame.

      Gets information about the current and commanded position of the specified frame in the frame tree below the flange of the serial kinematics relative to WORLD base frame SpatialObject.getRootFrame().
      com.kuka.device.common.PositionInformation getPositionInformation(com.kuka.geometry.Frame reference, com.kuka.geometry.Frame frameOnFlange)
      Gets information about the current and commanded position of the specified frame in the frame tree below the flange of the serial kinematics relative to the given reference frame.

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentCartesianPosition

        com.kuka.geometry.LocalFrame getCurrentCartesianPosition(com.kuka.geometry.Frame frameOnFlange)
        Gets the current cartesian position of the specified frame in the frame tree below the flange of the serial kinematics relative to WORLD base frame SpatialObject.getRootFrame(). The returned frame is a new instance of the Frame class.

        Additionally, this method fills the frame with frame information describing the redundancy values for the serial kinematics in the given frame.

        Parameters:
        frameOnFlange - The frame below or equal to the flange of the serial kinematics. null is not allowed
        Returns:
        The new frame with frame redundancy information. The parent for the new frame is the WORLD base frame.

      • getCurrentCartesianPosition

        com.kuka.geometry.LocalFrame getCurrentCartesianPosition(com.kuka.geometry.Frame frameOnFlange,
                                                         com.kuka.geometry.Frame reference)
        Gets the current cartesian position of the specified frame in the frame tree below the flange of the serial kinematics relative to the given reference frame. The returned frame is a new instance of the Frame class.

        Additionally, this method fills the created frame with the redundancy information for the serial kinematics in the created frame.

        Parameters:
        frameOnFlange - The frame below or equal to the flange of the serial kinematics. null is not allowed
        reference - The reference frame. null is not allowed.
        Returns:
        The new frame with redundancy information. The parent for the new frame is the reference frame.

      • getCommandedCartesianPosition

        com.kuka.geometry.LocalFrame getCommandedCartesianPosition(com.kuka.geometry.Frame frameOnFlange)
        Gets the commanded cartesian position of the specified frame in the frame tree below the flange of the serial kinematics relative to WORLD base frame SpatialObject.getRootFrame().

        The returned frame is a new instance of the Frame class including the redundancy information of the serial kinematics.

        Parameters:
        frameOnFlange - The frame below or equal to the flange of the serial kinematics. null is not allowed
        Returns:
        The new frame with redundancy information. The parent for the new frame is the WORLD base frame.

      • getCommandedCartesianPosition

        com.kuka.geometry.LocalFrame getCommandedCartesianPosition(com.kuka.geometry.Frame frameOnFlange,
                                                           com.kuka.geometry.Frame reference)
        Gets the commanded cartesian position of the specified frame in the frame tree below the flange of the serial kinematics relative to the given reference frame.

        The returned frame is a new instance of the Frame class including the redundancy information of the serial kinematics.

        Parameters:
        frameOnFlange - The frame below or equal to the flange of the serial kinematics. null is not allowed
        reference - The reference frame. null is not allowed.
        Returns:
        The new frame with redundancy information. The parent for the new frame is the reference frame.

      • getPositionInformation

        com.kuka.device.common.PositionInformation getPositionInformation(com.kuka.geometry.Frame frameOnFlange)
        Gets information about the current and commanded position of the specified frame in the frame tree below the flange of the serial kinematics relative to WORLD base frame SpatialObject.getRootFrame().
        Parameters:
        frameOnFlange - The frame below or equal to the flange of the serial kinematics. null is not allowed
        Returns:
        The position information. The frames contained in the returned PositionInformation are new instances of the Frame class containing the redundancy information of the serial kinematics in the created frame.

      • getPositionInformation

        com.kuka.device.common.PositionInformation getPositionInformation(com.kuka.geometry.Frame reference,
                                                                  com.kuka.geometry.Frame frameOnFlange)
        Gets information about the current and commanded position of the specified frame in the frame tree below the flange of the serial kinematics relative to the given reference frame.
        Parameters:
        frameOnFlange - The frame below or equal to the flange of the serial kinematics. null is not allowed
        reference - The reference frame. null is not allowed.
        Returns:
        The position information. The frames contained in the returned PositionInformation are new instances of the Frame class containing the redundancy information of the serial kinematics in the created frame.
